item.title: PostgreSQL Querying
item.description: The library(DBI) con <- DBI::dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(), user = 'postgres', password = getOption('db.password.postgres'), host = 'localhost', port = '5432') select now(); Table 1: 1 records now 2020-03-23 00:16:36 1 + 1 ## 2
